inclusion.criterion: minimum sample size needed for detection of a 6.5% difference in CCA-IMT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: protocol approved by Committee for the Protection of Human Subjects in Biomedical Research
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HIV-infected patients treated with HAART for > 12 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: dyslipidemia, defined as LDL cholesterol > 160 mg/dL before initiation of statin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: treated with pravastatin > 12 months and one more coronary risk factor
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patients in the control group were selected consecutively in the same departments among HIV-infected patients treated with HAART > 12 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: without lipid-lowering drugs and one more coronary risk factor
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: cases and control patients were matched for age, gender and tobacco consumption
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of CAD, which is a coronary risk factor. He also has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery.
